mods.abstract: Temple of Mandulis at Kalabsheh (Roman Period); incised, ruined Temple in pyramidal form with four open papyrus columns supporting cracked lintel adorned with winged sun disk (foreground); Temple complex ruins (background); "934: Nubie: Kalabcheh portique du Temple J.P. Sebah" in white along bottom of print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
